page.title: 13VISITORS TO PETT LEVEL
page.content: The number of{visitors}coming to the area, mainly in summer time, is increasing each year. Cars are tucked away in any available parking space. Mainly they are day visitors, but many cottages are rented or owned as{holiday homes.}A site for about 24 privately owned{caravans}stands between the Smuggler and Cliff End.The New Beach Club is a licensed private club, incorporating a Sailing and Fishing Club. On the beach at varying times, may be found:-lugdiggers, anglers, shrimpers, dog-walkers, horseriders, walkers, swimmers, wind-surfers,archaeologists, geologists, palaeontologists, hopefuls with metal detectors and artists.
